# buildTree

https://leetcode.com/problems/construct-binary-tree-from-preorder-and-inorder-traversal/

```js
const preorder = [-77,24,-74,84,93,28,83,6,95,58,59,66,22,-3,-66,-68,-22,3,-80,-79,-85,17,32,9,-88,-99,14,-60,13,-93,-63,91,82,21,26,-11,-32,-16,-100,-94,-31,-62,-89,49,-9,-8,87,-33,-81,80,0,69,-7,52,67,-5,-65,31,-30,37,-57,27,23,38,-28,7,-82,-42,11,-55,-36,-58,-24,89,56,73,41,18,-87,-70,4,-64,20,-52,-39,79,19,30,65,25,-71,-76,-1,62,-69,98,39,-25,-73,70,88,-17,-20,-75,55,34,57,81,-10,94,48,-35,5,-23,-44,40,-51,-61,-13,-86,63,71,-97,45,43,51,75,33,-34,92,47,-78,85,-26,97,-29,-92,-83,-59,74,96,68,77,16,-4,10,60,64,-21,-2,1,-91,86,46,76,-37,-19,-96,36,-98,29,-72,61,50,15,-95,-40,-43,-53,90,-15,-48,-27,-90,-54,72,-50,-49,-18,78,54,35,-38,99,44,-67,53,-12,-41,2,8,-14,-84,-56,-6,12,-45,42,-47,-46]
const inorder = [93,28,84,83,-74,59,58,66,-66,-3,-79,-80,3,-22,-68,22,-85,-99,14,-88,9,32,17,-60,95,-93,82,21,91,-63,26,13,-16,-32,-11,-100,6,-62,49,-89,-31,87,-8,69,0,80,-7,-81,-65,-5,67,-30,31,52,-33,37,-57,-9,7,-28,-42,-82,38,-55,11,23,-36,27,56,89,73,-24,41,-58,-70,-87,20,-64,-52,4,18,-94,19,30,-76,-1,-71,62,-69,25,-73,-25,70,39,88,98,-20,-17,65,55,-75,79,34,-39,48,94,-23,5,-44,-35,40,-10,-61,-51,-13,81,63,-97,71,-86,57,45,24,-34,85,97,-26,-78,-83,-92,74,-59,96,-29,68,47,77,92,10,-4,16,60,33,-21,1,86,76,46,-37,-91,-2,64,75,51,-19,-96,43,-98,29,61,-72,50,36,-95,-40,-43,15,90,-15,-53,-77,-54,-90,-49,-50,72,-27,35,54,-38,78,-67,44,53,99,-41,-12,-18,8,2,-48,-56,-84,-14,-45,12,42,-6,-46,-47]

buildTree(preorder, inorder);
```
